name: Citrus Wood
description: A fresh, citrusy, and woody scent with notes of jasmine, cedarwood, and amber.

name: Lemon Bloom
description: A bright and zesty fragrance with dominant lemon and floral notes.

name: Ocean Spice
description: A unique blend of spicy clove, marine freshness, and musky base.

name: Vanilla Dreams
description: A sweet and comforting scent with vanilla, amber, and coumarin.

name: Spiced Rose
description: A warm and elegant fragrance with cinnamon, rose, and woody notes.
